data.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Boop boop. 
<story>Boop beep boop boop. 
<story>Beep boop beep beep.

data.text:
"DEON" is『Zenno Rob Roy』. 
"Downlink", "downlink"――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"DEON" is『Zenno Rob Roy』. 
<story>"Downlink", "downlink"――

data.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Boop boop. 
<story>Boop beep boop boop. 
<story>Beep boop beep beep.

data.text:
――"FOBN"......"Communication" failed. 
――...However.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>――"FOBN"......"Communication" failed. 
<story>――...However.

data.text: ――"PYSC" may be "viable"?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――"PYSC" may be "viable"?

data.text: Event logo.
data.processed: <story>Event logo.

data.text: Huff... huff... huff...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Huff... huff... huff...!

data.text:
――Phew. 
...Oh... the cosmos flowers are already in bloom...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>――Phew. 
<story>...Oh... the cosmos flowers are already in bloom...

data.text: (Autumn is finally here. ...And with it, its GIs.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(Autumn is finally here. ...And with it, its GIs.)

data.text:
(In spring―― I took to the grand GI stage, hoping to win. 
...But victory was beyond my grasp.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(In spring―― I took to the grand GI stage, hoping to win. 
<story>...But victory was beyond my grasp.)

data.text:
(I couldn't live up to the mighty achievements of my forebearers. 
And those succeeding me are blessed with incredible talent―― 
Blinding brilliance threatens to envelop me from all directions.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I couldn't live up to the mighty achievements of my forebearers. 
<story>And those succeeding me are blessed with incredible talent―― 
<story>Blinding brilliance threatens to envelop me from all directions.)

data.text: (I'm still a far cry from the "hero" I hope to become...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(I'm still a far cry from the "hero" I hope to become...)

data.text:
But... That's exactly why I need to accomplish something this 
autumn. I need to take the Autumn Senior Triple Crown――!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>But... That's exactly why I need to accomplish something this 
<story>autumn. I need to take the Autumn Senior Triple Crown――!

data.text: That's it—pick up the pace! Try and keep up!　――Faster, Rob Roy!
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: That's it—pick up the pace! Try and keep up!　――Faster, Rob Roy!

data.text: ! Yaaaaahhhh!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: ! Yaaaaahhhh!

data.text: Huff... Huff...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Huff... Huff...!

data.text: Do another lap――One more time, Rob Roy.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: Do another lap――One more time, Rob Roy.

data.text: Your goal today―― Is to be within 0.1 seconds of the best time. ――Ensure it.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: Your goal today―― Is to be within 0.1 seconds of the best time. ――Ensure it.

data.text:
...Right! 
I'm sorry... Let's try one more time...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>...Right! 
<story>I'm sorry... Let's try one more time...!

data.text:
――Let us take―― A short break. 
――Rest. Then we run.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――Let us take―― A short break. 
<story>――Rest. Then we run.

data.text: Right, sorry, I'll be ready again soon...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Right, sorry, I'll be ready again soon...!

data.text: (...I need to work harder!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(...I need to work harder!)

data.text:
Okay... that should do it. We've got enough picnic blankets for 
the moon viewing. Now I need get the dango ingredients――
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Okay... that should do it. We've got enough picnic blankets for 
<story>the moon viewing. Now I need get the dango ingredients――

data.text:
――Oh, hey there, Universe. 
You look a little puzzled. Something on your mind?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>――Oh, hey there, Universe. 
<story>You look a little puzzled. Something on your mind?

data.text:
"WORR" has been "detected". 
...Fuji Kiseki is "transporting". Is this a mission?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"WORR" has been "detected". 
<story>...Fuji Kiseki is "transporting". Is this a mission?

data.text: Oh, all this? It's for the Moon Viewing Social. Just taking it out of storage.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: Oh, all this? It's for the Moon Viewing Social. Just taking it out of storage.

data.text: Oh! The Moon Viewing Social! Already that time of year, huh! Are ya in charge this time, Fuji-san?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Oh! The Moon Viewing Social! Already that time of year, huh! Are ya in charge this time, Fuji-san?

data.text: 『Moon Viewing』...?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>『Moon Viewing』...?

data.text:
I guess you haven't been to it before, Universe? 
We hold this event around this time every year to let students 
get together and socialize.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>I guess you haven't been to it before, Universe? 
<story>We hold this event around this time every year to let students 
<story>get together and socialize.

data.text:
We're coming up on the fall race season, right? Everyone's got 
their own goals for fall, so the Social gives them the chance to 
lend each other their support. That's the general idea.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>We're coming up on the fall race season, right? Everyone's got 
<story>their own goals for fall, so the Social gives them the chance to 
<story>lend each other their support. That's the general idea.

data.text: Girls who debuted, girls who ain't, senpai, kouhai, everybody gets together to train! It's a real good time!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Girls who debuted, girls who ain't, senpai, kouhai, everybody gets together to train! It's a real good time!

data.text: And the moon viewing after training is amazing!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: And the moon viewing after training is amazing!

data.text:
Everyone gets to eat outta the same pot and chew the chat! 
We talk a lot about our goals and cheer each other on for future 
races!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Everyone gets to eat outta the same pot and chew the chat! 
<story>We talk a lot about our goals and cheer each other on for future 
<story>races!

data.text:
There's also a tradition of giving each other shoe care tools. 
Racers like us get a lot of use out of those tools, so they're 
really important gifts.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>There's also a tradition of giving each other shoe care tools. 
<story>Racers like us get a lot of use out of those tools, so they're 
<story>really important gifts.

data.text:
"I want to encourage you," "I want to support you", "let's both 
do our best...". That's what the gift of a tool can tell someone. 
It can mean a lot for our racing endeavors.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>"I want to encourage you," "I want to support you", "let's both 
<story>do our best...". That's what the gift of a tool can tell someone. 
<story>It can mean a lot for our racing endeavors.

data.text: Dober and I exchanged gifts!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Dober and I exchanged gifts!

data.text:
Short and mile for me, middle distances for Dober. 
"So let's both do our best and win the races we're aiming for!" 
Y'know?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Short and mile for me, middle distances for Dober. 
<story>"So let's both do our best and win the races we're aiming for!" 
<story>Y'know?

data.text:
Getting cheered on by everyone really motivated us! 
Thanks to all their encouragement, we got out GI wins!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Getting cheered on by everyone really motivated us! 
<story>Thanks to all their encouragement, we got out GI wins!

data.text: 『Moon Viewing』... 『Mutual support』... Autumn race season...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>『Moon Viewing』... 『Mutual support』... Autumn race season...

data.text:
...Sigh. 
I couldn't make time today either.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>...Sigh. 
<story>I couldn't make time today either.

data.text:
(I went as far as to ask her to train me personally, even knowing 
it was unreasonable... The way I am now, I'm only causing 
trouble for Kris S-san...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I went as far as to ask her to train me personally, even knowing 
<story>it was unreasonable... The way I am now, I'm only causing 
<story>trouble for Kris S-san...)

data.text:
――Hey, it's almost time for the Moon Viewing Social, isn't it? 
You think we should go? I know you want to do your best this 
fall.
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed:
<story>――Hey, it's almost time for the Moon Viewing Social, isn't it? 
<story>You think we should go? I know you want to do your best this 
<story>fall.

data.text:
For sure. It's like, a real morale boost, and I'm hoping to learn 
a thing or two from our senpai, you know? 
So, yeah, let's go! Together!
data.name: Umamusume B
data.processed:
<story>For sure. It's like, a real morale boost, and I'm hoping to learn 
<story>a thing or two from our senpai, you know? 
<story>So, yeah, let's go! Together!

data.text: Oh... That's right, there's going to be a social...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Oh... That's right, there's going to be a social...

data.text:
(It's a large group training, then a dinner party, if I remember 
correctly... Everyone is doing so much to prepare for the autumn 
season...)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(It's a large group training, then a dinner party, if I remember 
<story>correctly... Everyone is doing so much to prepare for the autumn 
<story>season...)

data.text:
(I wonder... I wonder if I can improve enough. 
Can I reach my goal before the season starts...?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I wonder... I wonder if I can improve enough. 
<story>Can I reach my goal before the season starts...?)

data.text:
(――I can't think like that. I can do it, I know I will. 
I won't let Kris S-san's help go to waste...!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(――I can't think like that. I can do it, I know I will. 
<story>I won't let Kris S-san's help go to waste...!)

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy's current "mode": "REVS". 
Acknowledging "aid" as "MORT". 
"Code":  『Moon Viewing』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy's current "mode": "REVS". 
<story>Acknowledging "aid" as "MORT". 
<story>"Code":  『Moon Viewing』.

data.text: ――Mission, "liftoff".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>――Mission, "liftoff".
